description:
As Retry on request is always enabled in oslo.db, so kwarg retry_on_request is deprecated for removal in new release Queens.

https://bugs.launchpad.net/oslo.db/+bug/1714440
http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/oslo.db/tree/oslo_db/api.py#n109
title: Remove usage of kwarg retry_on_request in API

comments.content:
As Retry on request is always enabled in oslo.db, so kwarg retry_on_request is deprecated for removal in new release.

https://bugs.launchpad.net/oslo.db/+bug/1714440
http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/oslo.db/tree/oslo_db/api.py#n109
